info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A line of showers with strong winds will impact portions of north central Starke and La Porte Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers from west of Michigan City to South Wanatah, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Michigan City, La Porte, Westville, Trail Creek, New Carlisle, Kingsford Heights, Wanatah, Hamlet, Hanna, Kingsbury, Waterford, Pinhook, Salem Heights, Fish Lake, Otis, Brems, Stillwell, Haskell, Byron and Thomaston. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 38 and 56. Interstate 94 in Indiana between mile markers 33 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
